availableControlTests.name: UAR-Q4-Access Controls Review
availableControlTests.objective: Ensure appropriate access rights across financial systems

availableControlTests.name: SOX-404-Revenue Recognition
availableControlTests.objective: Verify revenue is recognized per ASC 606

availableControlTests.name: 3WM-Q4-Three Way Match
availableControlTests.objective: Verify purchase orders, receipts, and invoices match before payment

availableControlTests.name: CM-101-Change Management
availableControlTests.objective: Ensure all system changes follow proper approval and testing procedures

defaultSections.title: User Access Listing Review
defaultSections.testPerformed: Obtained complete user access listing from all financial systems and compared against authorized user list maintained by HR.
defaultSections.resultSummary: Reviewed 1,247 user accounts across 15 systems. Identified 3 users with access that requires management review.
